name: Gravity Panda
description: Gravity Panda is a platform game that changes the direction of gravity and resolve the puzzle.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7/8/10 64bit Processor: 1GH Memory: 2 GB RAM DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 230 MB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
